value.title: Create and use custom visuals for Power BI in minutes!!
value.excerpt: Create and use custom visuals for Power BI in minutes!! If you are not able to use custom visuals from the AppStore but you still need them, you can now create your own and use them in Power BI, all of that in minutes!  In today's video, I am going to show you how you can use a custom visual we created

value.title: DAX Fridays! #30: SEARCH vs FIND
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays! tutorial we are going to go though examples on how to use two DAX functions: SEARCH and FIND  SEARCH and FIND DAX functions are used to find the number of characters at which a specific word is found in a column. value.title: DAX Fridays! #42: SUBSTITUTE (multiple values)
value.excerpt: In today's video, we will learn how to use the DAX function SUBSTITUTE.  Substitute changes text for another text. We will do two examples, how to substitute one value for another and how to substitute multiple values.   Northwind dataset: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3NMIlLffrU  EXCEL SURVEY: https://1drv.ms/xs/s!Ar8CDNp8cGTcgjaHonN82T8I1jQT

value.title: DAX Fridays! #49: SELECTEDVALUE
value.excerpt: In today's video, we will go through the DAX function SELECTEDVALUE.
